attributes.review: The worst app you can ever have. It hacked my phone and sold all my data and now my late grandma is coming back to tell me what I had on my phone. It never ends. Grandma please go back to rest.
attributes.title: Ugh

attributes.review: This app is ✨𝑠𝑡𝑖𝑙𝑙 𝑎 𝑝𝑖𝑒𝑐𝑒 𝑜𝑓 𝑔𝑎𝑟𝑏𝑎𝑔𝑒✨ and so is the joke of the president it’s “helping” campaign for. 0/10 would not recommend downloading this app unless you want to be fed the same senseless garbage that comes out of Trump’s puckered butthole of a mouth! 💕
attributes.title: Hi, thanks for checking in

attributes.review: I was incredibly excited to install this app and support the orangutan that is currently in office, but when I opened up the app all I saw were orange Cheetos? Is this some elaborate joke? I’m very disappointed and will never endorse Trump ever again. Biden 2020 🙈✨🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.title: BIDEN 2020

attributes.review: This app it’s the absolute worst!!!! It crashed my phone erased all of the data stored on my phone and caused the screen to flash a very bright ORANGE color on the screen whenever the app was opened. This app raised my rent, my student debt, and my blood pressure. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND TO A FRIEND! Ever!
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE!!! WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app is by far one of the most corrupt apps I have ever seen. Very slow. Filled with fake news!! Disappointed in this app and the Trump administration. If I could rate it zero stars I would.
attributes.title: I am disappointed

attributes.review: as soon as i got this app all of my friends beat me down with their mean insults, they called me a red neck and a boot licker which i am definitely not!!! 😠😠👎🏻 this app made my mommy kill herself because she didn’t want a trump supporter for a daughter!! i blame this app.
attributes.title: Lit Rally DISGUSTANG

attributes.review: Absolutely horrible, was not the app I was expecting, and I’ve seen some apps, amazing apps, but this one is absolute garbage compared to those. If you want a app for winners, this is not the app, believe me

attributes.review: I was surprised to see Trump make an app with such poor quality! Took minutes to load, difficult to navigate, and overall trash.
attributes.title: Make a new app!

attributes.review: The liberals are at it again. This app took MINUTES to download, and once downloaded, it is so slow!!! I can’t see any of the words because trump has clouded my eyesight with ignorance. 😤 This is a disgrace. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!!!!!!!! If I could give it 0 stars I would.
attributes.title: DEMOCRATIC PROPOGANDA!!!

attributes.review: this app shot and KILLED my elderly grandmother 😿 and tortured the rest of my family by forcing them to listen to country music on max volume 😡 do NOT download this app i repeat DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!!!!!!! and an orangutan 🦧 appeared in my house and said his name was bunker boy and ate all my food 😢.
